News.Title: GreenChef Appliances Secures Large Order from HPCL
News.Summary: GreenChef Appliances has received a significant order from Hindustan Petroleum Corporation Limited (HPCL) for the supply of 2,028,400 pieces of hose pipe. This order represents a substantial business opportunity for GreenChef Appliances, a company with a market capitalization of 166 crore rupees.
